description: Keep your iPod and iPhone charged no matter where you're headed. Plug the Belkin Dual Auto Charger into your 12V cigarette lighter/power socket, and it will charge both devices. Charge them while you use them, and enjoy music, make phone calls, and more without draining your batteries.Thanks to the dual USB ports, you can charge any two USB devices simultaneously. An iPod/iPhone cable and mini-USB cable are provided for use with most devices.What's in the BoxDual auto charger, iPod/iPhone charge cable, and mini-USB cable for other devices.
title: Belkin Dual USB Car Charger for iPod (Black)
